attributes.action: Theresa May to step down and JRM to become PM
attributes.additional_details: The people call on JRM to take the lead of the Conservative Party to Ensure they WIN this next election and get the Brexit that 17.4 million voted for... We are your employers and JRM gets paid to serve us.... If conservatives want to win the next GE they MUST listen to the public outcry
attributes.background: We the British people, call for Theresa May to step down as a vote of no confidence. It is apparent she does not intend on putting the British people first! Our NHS is failing and over 200,000 children homeless and you feel it OK to give 44.7mil to France as well as men posing as refugees

rejection.details:
As you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
